itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Red Crystals found near Khuruto Cave.

item.name: Rough Red Crystal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Red Crystal requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered near the Khuruto Cave.

item.name: Talis Helmet
item.desc: This armor has reduced defense in return for better flexibility. Mostly worn by nobles.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Talis Armor
item.desc: This armor has reduced defense in return for better flexibility. Mostly worn by nobles.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Maple Float
item.desc: A float made of maple wood. Good for catching rare fishes.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Red Crystal Amulet of Lovers
item.desc: An accessory made of Red Crystal. Those who want to win someone's love carry this around with them as a charm.

item.name: Ultimate Talis Shoes
item.desc: Talis Shoes with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Talis Shoes

item.desc: Talis Gloves with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Talis Gloves

item.name: Talis Shoes of Intimidation
item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Talis Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Talis Shoes of Duress, Talis Shoes

item.name: Grade 2 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 2nd-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.
